body.p:
You can use one of the Marketing Post action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Marketing category to ask the AI Positron to create a marketing post for a selection containing release notes.

A Marketing Post AI action from a specific content is incredibly useful to end users as it helps businesses effectively promote their products or services to a wider audience. By utilizing AI technology, this action can generate engaging and persuasive marketing posts that are tailored to the target audience, maximizing the chances of attracting potential customers.
Select the content in the code block below containing release notes and invoke the AI Positron Assistant Marketing->Marketing Post action:

p.codeblock: - URL contents in input panels are now presented unescaped, improving user experience. - Non-ASCII characters are no longer escaped when correcting URLs, making the process more seamless for users. - Publishing now works even if all file names in a DITA project are translated to Chinese, allowing for greater flexibility in localization. - File names are now computed from titles in a more flexible manner, enhancing user control over the naming process. - Fast topic creation now offers increased flexibility for creating files based on titles, improving efficiency for users. - PDF publishing for DITA projects with all file names in Chinese is now possible, resolving a previous limitation. - The message no longer contains escaped characters when the project xpr file name contains Chinese characters in the application, ensuring clear communication. - The rename/move preview no longer contains escaped characters in the changes list, providing a more accurate representation of the changes. - Search references now display non-ASCII file names without escaped characters, improving search accuracy and readability. - Exporting a zip file now shows unescaped characters for file names containing non-ASCII characters, ensuring file integrity during export. - When creating a new DITA topic, the generated ID is now more complete, reducing the need for manual adjustments. - Building deliverables is now possible even when the DITA map name is in Chinese, removing a previous limitation.
